article_title: California Could Be the First State To Offer a Universal 401(k)

twitter.title: A Universal 401(k)? California Considers a Radical Proposal To ...
twitter.description:
California thinks it has a solution to Americans’ woeful preparation for retirement: a near-universal 401(k) plan.
The state legislature on Monday received recommendations from a state board ...

article_metadata.sailthru.title: A Universal 401(k)? California Considers a Radical Proposal To Help Workers Save
article_metadata.description: California is considering a law to create savings plans for workers without access to an employer-sponsored 401(k).
